tweet: Defensive stop for the Panthers as they will take the ball at their own 41-yard line with 13:49 left in the first half.
Note: EIU's Jake Christensen 5-for-5, UTM's Cade Thompson's 7-for-9 in the passing department with 14:06 left in the first half.
EIU Lorence Ricks catches the wide-open pass from Christensen as EIU leads 21-7 with 14:54 in the second quarter.  #eiufb
End of the first, EIU leads UTM 14-7. The Panthers are on UTM's 27-yard line.
UTM Miguel Barnes runs in the 2-yard TD as EIU leads 14-7.
